book: 0718-Juana Skin Ultra-Rich Night Cream, Switch Me Off

chunk:
Directions: Apply Switch Me Off at night. Gently massage into your cleansed face and neck as the last step of your skincare routine.

Warnings: : for external use only. Do not use on damanged or broken skin. If contact with eyes, rinse with water to remove. Keep out of reach of children. Keep away from heat and direct sunlight.
book: 0718-Juana Skin Ultra-Rich Night Cream, Switch Me Off
